message.name: HTTP_403_CASESECURITY_CHECK_READONLY_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to maintain this data.

message.name: HTTP_403_CASESECURITY_CHECK_ACCESS_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to access this data.

message.name: HTTP_403_CASESECURITY_CHECK_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have maintenance rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: HTTP_403_CONCERNROLE_FV_SENSITIVE
message.locale: You do not have access to this client's details.

message.name: HTTP_403_CASENOTE_SL_FV_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You do not have access to this case note.

message.name: HTTP_403_PARTICIPANTNOTE_SL_FV_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You do not have access to this participant note.
